article.description: Mike Gansey scored 24 points and Kevin Pittsnogle added 18 as West Virginia beat the University of Maryland-Baltimore County 82-53 Wednesday.
article.headline: Gansey, Pittsnogle lead Mountaineer charge
article.story: MORGANTOWN, W.Va. (AP) -- Mike Gansey scored 24 points and Kevin Pittsnogle added 18 as West Virginia beat the University of Maryland-Baltimore County 82-53 Wednesday. Eighteen of Gansey's points came in the first half, including six in a key 12-0 first half run. The Mountaineers (5-3) hit four consecutive 3-pointers in the push, turning a 20-16 lead into a 32-16 advantage with 4:14 left in the first half. It was part of a 22-5 closing run as WVU led 42-21 at the break. The Mountaineers then scored 13 of the first 15 second-half points for a 54-24 lead with 17:22 left. The last basket, a lay-in from Gansey for his final points, capped a 35-7 run spanning the halves. Pittsnogle, WVU's career leader in 3-point shooting percentage, made three of six shots from behind the arc. He led the Mountaineers to a 32-26 edge over UMBC in the paint. Jo Herber added eight assists for WVU. UMBC was led by John Zito's 17 points. Jerrell Dinkins and Chris Pugh each added 11. Ten players scored for West Virginia, which had 26 assists and 11 steals.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
